titleStmt.title: Anōthekrypta, or, Glorious mysteries wherein the grand proceedings betwixt Christ and the soule ... : is clearly laid open ... / by S.M., minister of the Gospel of God.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Samuel, b. 1617.

notesStmt.note: Appears also in his Theosplanchnistheis. London, 1647.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
